data.name: VRNOID
data.description:
Your goal is to destroy all bricks and enemies. Collect dropped power-ups but make sure not to miss a ball. Swing your hand to hit the ball just like in Air Hockey.

Enemies are trying to shoot your VR head, which takes the challenge to a new level. Dodge bullets or reflect them into the enemy.

Features:
Advanced boss fights: Some bosses are weak at the back, others can't be hit by the ball, etc. Each boss requires a unique approach to defeat it.

In-game level editor 
Try out your ideas. Full VR, no need to leave the game or use a mouse.

Air Hockey: additional game mode with few setups and exciting power-ups.

Flexible difficulty: 8 gameplay modifiers and 5 game difficulties are available. Play in your own style.

Quick room setup: mega easy to calibrate room. Just hold one button to set direction and table height. Several seconds to do!

changelog.change_log: Added the correct auto graphics settings on first run for Meta Quest 2, if you have played before try to go to the graphics settings and select all to high
Leaderboards and achievements are now available

Epic update: New levels, new "Campaign+" mode, video quality settings, Improvements, and fixes

Added 7 Extra levels to the Campaign mode. These levels have a higher difficulty and also use bricks (like axes) that have not been used in the campaign before. Each level has 5-6 stages


Campaign +
After you have completed the "Campaign", the "Campaign +" mode opens, in which a real challenge awaits you. This mode has difficulty modifiers that can only be partially changed. This is exactly the difficulty I wanted to achieve at the beginning of the development
In addition, added achievement for completing Campaign+

Improvements
"Tournament" mode was renamed to "Arcade" mode. Now this mode will be available from the beginning
In "Arcade" mode, long and challenging levels await you as you would expect in classic arcade games

UI- added "Next Level" button after completing a level.

fixed a bug- when the level is completed, losing a ball still can cost a health
removed the  request for external storage permission

added video quality settings
added bloom settings
